title.rendered: STEDI 1,000 Lumen BA15S Reverse LED Upgrade (Pair)

content.rendered:
Extreme high power BA15S LED upgrade.

DETAILS

Let’s face it the factory fitted halogen reverse bulbs just don’t cut it, not even close.

For those of us that don’t want to mount auxiliary reverse lights, our high power BA15S LED is the ultimate plug and play solution.

A typical halogen bulb usually has an efficiency of 18 Lumens per watt of input power, as compared to an astonishing 76 Lumens per watt of input power four LED upgrade, which represents a 4.2 x increase in brightness, and less overall power consumption.

Our high brightness reverse upgrades have built-in error cancellation making them compatible with any CANBUS application.

The connectors plug straight into the vehicles factory wiring. The rubber grommet fits any hole size between 23mm and 29mm

Due to the high level of brightness, we recommend that these only be used for reverse.

Sold as pairs.

SPECIFICATIONS

HOUSING MATERIAL Aluminium
LED 9 X SEOUL CSP emitters
POWER 1.0a @ 13.6v
LUMEN 1,000 LM ± 40 M
COMPATIBLE VOLTAGE DC 12v and 24v (Surge 32V)
LIFESPAN 30,000 Hours
CANBUS Compatible
CONNECTOR TYPE BA15S
INGRESS PROTECTION IP65
OPERATING TEMP -40°c to + 80°c
CERTIFICATION CE, ROHS
COORDINATED COLOUR TEMP 5800K

 

 

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x BAY15S 1156 S25 P21W P21W 7507

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
